RoomDescription: The road travels under many wooden passages reaching overhead from building to building.  A wall to the side is covered in mechanical cogs and gears which turn slowly, making the sound of an oversized grandfather clock.  In the centre of the wall stands a metal door slightly ajar.

RoomExits.Echo: As you enter you can see that the room is gloomy – probably because of the piles of crates in front of the windows – and there're no torches lit.
Obviously you've moved into a more upmarket area of town, the well-to-do houses are set back in plush gardens along this around.

RoomItems.ItemDescription: An A4 piece of paper that is damp and ruined but you can read "In need of rat catcher for primrose gates" it is in big bold writing then you can just about read small directions to primrose gates [i]head to Chorsters Road, then enter Primrose Gates Estate from there[/i]
